description: Maximal number of edges in Hamiltonian path in complete graph on n nodes.
comments: Quasipolynomial of order 2. [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 07 2011]
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,-2,-1,1).
formula: C(n, 2) if n odd, C(n, 2)-n/2+1 if n even; G.f.: x^2*(1+2*x+x^3)/((1-x)*(1-x^2)).a(n)= ( n*n +n -(n-1)*(n mod 2) )/2. [_Frank Ellermann_]
author: _Colin Mallows_
